column5: Managed to get out Saturday for a few hours on a local lake for Brookies.  We did some bush whacking to get to the back of the lake where we found 4" of nice black ice.  Felt good to drill some holes and ice a limit of brook trout.    Funny thing is that I could have been muskie fishing on Lac Seul 2 days earlier, if my boat wasn't put away.  Gotta love NW Ontario!!
Beauty fish.  I'm hoping for ice by Dec 17-18th down here....but I'm getting less optimistic everyday.  Thx for sharing that.
Dang Ben, that's a nice brookie. Can't believe you are already drilling holes! I still have lots of open water fishing left before I drill holes.
Right on dude. I'm not ready for ice myself, but if it's brookies like that I'd make an exception.
wow ... I am still dusting off my ice gear .... your'e killin me !!!
Lucky guy, Ben.  The cold hasn't mated with our water yet...
nice Ben cant wait to hit the hardwater myself
Nice! thanks for teasing me...lol, Good job on the brookie, saaweet!
